title: YOOtheme club Sixth Avenue theme (May 2015)
description:
Sixth Avenue! This posh magazine style theme has a very elegant, minimalistic design approach with a lot of love for detail. This makes it perfect for your blog or news website.

Pages

To give you a better impression of what is possible with our themes and Widgetkit 2, we have recently started to add custom pages the each release. They present different widgets and their usecases in a context that thematically fits each theme. Sixth Avenue comes with customized About, Features, Services and Blog pages as well as a Gallery to create a beautiful portfolio and a magazine like Dynamic Blog.

New Widgets

Sixth Avenue makes use of our highly anticipated new Widgetkit 2.3 release! It presents three new widgets: Slider, Parallax and Slideset! All three can be spotted on the frontpage of Sixth Avenue. Watch out for the Widgetkit 2.3 release early next week.

Theme Features

Sixth Avenue allows you to apply a full width dropdown to the main navigation. The dropdown can be triggered on hover or on click. As usual, you can adjust the number of columns and the dropdown width in the Warp administration. To easily highlight block sections, you can apply different background colors and paddings through the Warp administration. Additionally, this theme offers the Offset option that will pull panels up for a more dynamic layout.

A lot of details, like overlays, custom animations, drop caps and the beautiful typography give this theme its individuality. As usual, Sixth Avenue comes with 6 style variations.

Optional full width dropdown and fixed main menu
Custom article layout
Block offset option
Optional drop cap for articles
New Slider, Parallax and Slideset widgets
Demo pages built with Widgetkit 2
Full UIkit components styling
6 pre-built style variations
Easy customizer and LESS integration
WooCommerce support
